attributes.additional_details:
To focus funding into the correct facilities to improve global well being.
To reduce the amount of food wasted and to contribute towards the Millennium Development Goal to reduce poverty and starvation in third world countries.

We are specifically focused on the amount of money going towards military defenses (as important as they are, we believe they are highly imbursed) and the amount of food discarded which could easily go to countries less fortunate.
